message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into $7500 for me and $2500 for you. This offers a reasonable split considering the first round.
I'm willing to give you a higher share in the next round, but this is a fair starting point. Your turn to negotiate!
Considering the inflation and previous offers, I propose a division of $5250 for me and $4750 for you. This aims to be a fair compromise given the decreasing value of money with each round.
I'm trying to find a balance between getting a fair share and not giving away too much, considering the inflation. Your turn to think about it!
